Nightlight:

Nightlight smiled and said "Yes... Of course"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus smiled, she was worried, she had no reason to be. Rodimus' 
reasons for talking to her were personal.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: No, nothing with him. I wanted to know if you would 
like to join me in the Mess Hall for some dinner?
> 
> Rodimus hoped she would say yes. In the last few days of talking to 
her during his normal functions as Commander Rodimus had become 
attracted to her. His younger Hot Rod side wouldn't let him pass this 
up without even taking a chance.
